); } } Meals.propTypes = { fetchMeals:PropTypes.func.isRequired, meals:PropTypes.array.isRequired } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ meals:state.meals.items }); export default connect(mapStateToProps,{fetchMeals})(Meals);
